text.p: The following are reports carried by Estonia's newspapers on Friday. Reuters has not verified these reports and does not vouch for their accuracy:
- Contradictory opinions have been expressed by Finnish ministry officials over the possible deadline for visa free travel with Estonia.
- UNHCR regional representative in the Baltics, Hans Thoolen, is not satisfied with Estonia's slow approach to developing a refugee policy.
- September 6 marks the fifth anniversary of the Soviet Union's formal recognition of the independence of the three Baltic states, Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania.
- The reorganisation of government institutions would cut 1,133 jobs from the public service by July 1997.
- Coalition Party MP Ulo Vooglaid intends to leave parliament to write a book.
- Three current cabinet members and one former minister are on the list of candidates for the local council elections in October.
